bug.author: alalek
bug.summary: G-API: broken compilation of samples (winpack, MSVS 2017)
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/master-win64-vc15/builds/419>Nightly MSVS2017 build is broken</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:http://pullrequest.opencv.org/buildbot/builders/master_winpack-test-win64-vc15/builds/872>Winpack configuration</denchmark-link> (samples against prebuilt binaries)
MSVS 2017 has problem: 19.16.27035.0 (15.9.20), 19.16.27042.0 (15.9.25 - latest) MSVS 2015 is clean MSVS 2019 is clean (manual test). It has similar bug report against compiler.
relates <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/pull/17502>#17502</denchmark-link>
/cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmatveev>@dmatveev</denchmark-link>
Error message: <denchmark-code>C:\build\master_winpack-test-win64-vc15\build\distrib\opencv\build\include\opencv2/gapi/infer.hpp(111): error C3546: '...': there are no parameter packs available to expand [C:\build\master_winpack-test-win64-vc15\build\samples_build\cpp\example_tutorial_age_gender_emotion_recognition.vcxproj] C:\build\master_winpack-test-win64-vc15\build\distrib\opencv\sources\samples\cpp\tutorial_code\gapi\age_gender_emotion_recognition\age_gender_emotion_recognition.cpp(79): note: see reference to class template instantiation 'cv::GNetworkType<custom::Faces,std::function<cv::GMat (cv::GMat)>>' being compiled C:\build\master_winpack-test-win64-vc15\build\distrib\opencv\build\include\opencv2/gapi/infer.hpp(87): error C3546: '...': there are no parameter packs available to expand [C:\build\master_winpack-test-win64-vc15\build\samples_build\cpp\example_tutorial_age_gender_emotion_recognition.vcxproj] C:\build\master_winpack-test-win64-vc15\build\distrib\opencv\sources\samples\cpp\tutorial_code\gapi\age_gender_emotion_recognition\age_gender_emotion_recognition.cpp(85): note: see reference to class template instantiation 'cv::GNetworkType<custom::AgeGender,std::function<custom::AGInfo (cv::GMat)>>' being compiled </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/dmatveev>@dmatveev</denchmark-link> This is blocker for 4.4.0 release. If there is no fix or upgrading compiler on CI (MSVS2017 15.9.20 ->Â 15.9.25) doesn't help then I will revert mentioned PR (deadline 15:00 UTC - 4 hours from now).
Compiler upgrade doesn't help. MSVS 2017 15.9.25 (19.16.27042.0) has similar problem. Workaround is required.
Please contact me directly for latency < day, I do rarely check the GH notifications
